tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE books_sales (
    book_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    book_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    sold_quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL,
    discount DECIMAL,
    revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES books(book_id)
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author TEXT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    discount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_revenue DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES books(book_id)
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    discount DECIMAL(4, 2),
    revenue DECIMAL(12, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    book_id INT,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity INT
);
CREATE TABLE books ( book_id INT PRIMARY KEY, book_title VARCHAR(100), author_name VARCHAR(50), genre VARCHAR(30), price DECIMAL(10,2), discount DECIMAL(5,2), revenue DECIMAL(10,2) );
CREATE TABLE authors ( author_id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_name VARCHAR(50), nationality VARCHAR(50), birth_year INT, gender CHAR(1) );
CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(15) );
CREATE TABLE orders ( order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, order_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2) );
CREATE TABLE order_items ( order_id INT, book_id INT, quantity INT, price DECIMAL(10,2) )
